page.title: 15School Holidays in Upottery
page.content:
Melanie's half term diary.
{Saturday.}Fed the lambs.Dug my garden. Planted seeds. {Sunday.}Chickens began to hatch.Cow calved.Put up pea netting. {Monday.}Read a book most of the morning.Hunted around the orchard for eggs.A friend came to tea. {Tuesday. }Went to Grandma's for the day.Bought a new pair of shoes. {Wednesday.}Helped Daddy do the fencing.Helped Mummy collect moss and do her hanging baskets. {Thursday.}Made a tent.Read a book. Played tennis.Another cow calved. {Friday.}Did cooking in the morning. Watched Daddy sheep shearing. {Saturday.}Thomas came for the day. Played tennis and had lunch in the tent. {Sunday.}Grandad and Nan came today.
